briefTitle: Surgical Skill Labs for Robotic Mastectomy and Educational Program Using a Surgical Guide by Artificial Intelligence
officialTitle: Surgical Skill Labs for Robotic Mastectomy Using Cadaver And Porcine Models and Educational Program Using a Surgical Guide by Artificial Intelligence
conditions: Breast Neoplasms, Surgery, Educational Problems, Surgical Procedure, Unspecified
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Satisfaction questionnaire of a educational program
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* A breast surgeon who completed the basic dry lab for surgical robot platform before the educational program
* A trainee who signed a informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* A trainee who did not sign a informed consent
* A trainees judged by the researcher to be inappropriate for participation in this study
